title: Bug 7581 - ComboBox Cell Editor does not size correctly in property sheet
description: The ComboBox Cell Editor in the property sheet is not sizing correctly.
OB: When using the ComboBox Cell Editor in the property sheet, it does not display properly and its size is incorrect.
EB: The ComboBox Cell Editor in the property sheet should display properly and have the correct size.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the property sheet. 2. Set a cell to use the ComboBox Cell Editor. 3. Observe that the ComboBox Cell Editor is not sized correctly.
